mapper.insert: insert into updates (nature_update, modification_activite_etablissement, modification_nature_etablissement, modification_entreprise, date) values (#{nature_update}, #{modification_activite_etablissement}, #{modification_nature_etablissement}, #{modification_entreprise})
mapper.update: update updates set nature_update = #{nature_update}, modification_activite_etablissement = #{modification_activite_etablissement}, modification_nature_etablissement = #{modification_nature_etablissement}, modification_entreprise = #{modification_entreprise}, date = #{date} where id = #{id}
